title: One Piece: This Filler Arc Had the Funniest Joke in the Entire Show
author: GameRant Staff
description: An article discussing the G-8 Arc and the famous Condoriano joke, explaining why it's considered one of the funniest moments in One Piece despite being filler content. The article analyzes how Usopp's improvised lie created a lasting meme in the community.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Only discusses G-8 Arc content, no spoilers beyond episode 206

title: One Piece Filler Arcs, Part 2 -- G-8, Dreams and Foxy
author: Blackjack
description: A comprehensive review and analysis of One Piece filler arcs, with extensive coverage of the G-8 Arc. The blog post discusses why the G-8 Arc stands out among filler content and analyzes its strengths including character writing, humor, and Jonathan as an antagonist.

title: One Piece Diaries #25: G-8 Arc
author: COMICON Staff
description: Part of the 'One Piece Diaries' series where the author watches One Piece for the first time. This entry covers the G-8 Arc, providing fresh perspective on the filler arc from a new viewer's experience.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewer perspective on G-8 Arc

title: Episode 205 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 205 containing plot summary, credits, trivia, and character appearances. Includes Japanese and English episode titles, air dates, and production information.

title: G-8 Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Complete wiki page for the G-8 Arc containing arc overview, episode list, character information, plot summary, and reception notes. Includes information about why it's considered the best filler arc.

title: 205: The One Fell Swoop Plan! Jonathan's Surefire Secret Tactic!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Detailed episode recap and commentary from a blogger watching One Piece for the first time. Provides scene-by-scene analysis, character observations, and reactions to key moments including the Condoriano gag, Robin's tactical genius, and Nami's heroic rescue.

title: Why is G8 considered the best filler arc in One Piece?
author: Quora Community
description: Community discussion thread with multiple answers explaining why the G-8 Arc is highly praised. Discusses Jonathan's character, the comedy, pacing, and how it compares to other filler arcs. Provides fan perspectives on what makes this arc special.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discussion of G-8 Arc quality and content

title: G-8 Arc Episode 205 - One Piece Anime Edit
author: g.nicorobinnnnn
description: Short-form video content featuring clips or edits from Episode 205 of the G-8 Arc. Part of TikTok's One Piece community content.

title: Dreamship - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for the ending theme song 'Dreamship' by Aiko Ikuta, which was used exclusively for the G-8 Arc (episodes 196-206). Includes lyrics, artist information, and trivia about it being the only ending theme exclusive to a filler arc.

title: 8 Best One Piece Characters Created For The Anime, Ranked
author: GameRant Staff
description: Article ranking the best anime-original One Piece characters. Vice Admiral Jonathan from the G-8 Arc is prominently featured and praised for his intelligence, reasonable nature, and competence as an antagonist.
